name: POLLOCOCODRILO: A Tribute
description:
A tribute to POLLOCOCODRILO. Made for Bitsy Secret Santa.

You can watch the original POLLOCOCODRILO here.

MERRY CHRISTMAS, GALLUS! I'm sorry all I could come up with were old memes!

Thanks to: ducky for making bitsymuse, candle for making a ui for it, adam le doux for making bitsy, and lunafromthemoon for giving me pointers on how to draw pixel animals.
